channel.title: 317 Client Base! 100% GodSword Stances And 100% Special Attack Anims
channel.description:
[center]317 Client Base! For Beginners/ Experts To Start Off![/center]
[center]Features: 1. 100% GodSword Stances,Blocking,Attack And Running. 2. 100% GodSword Specials! 3. Client Has Been Set To Connect Localhost: 127.0.0.1 4. Easy To Edit And Start Coding __________________________ Some Pictures: [img]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/317ClientBase1.jpg[/img] [img]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/317ClientBase2.jpg[/img] [img]http://i992.photobucket.com/albums/af50/pkingownz/317ClientBase3.jpg[/img] Adding more pics later. About Godsword things. Now Download:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?w01jtzy4mjz]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?w01jtzy4mjz[/url] Now Credits For Sure: SilentCJ Noobie22 Ii Claw iI[/center] Please post replys.
